include-in-header.text:
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.0.0/css/all.min.css">
<style>
  :root {
    --primary: #2C3E50;
    --accent: #E74C3C;
    --light: #ECF0F1;
  }
  .hero {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary) 0%, #3498DB 100%);
    color: white;
    padding: 5rem 2rem;
    text-align: center;
    margin-bottom: 3rem;
    border-radius: 0 0 20px 20px;
  }
  .card-container {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr));
    gap: 2rem;
    padding: 2rem 0;
  }
  .card {
    border: none;
    border-radius: 12px;
    padding: 2rem;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    background: white;
    box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  .card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-10px);
    box-shadow: 0 15px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  }
  .card h3 {
    margin-top: 0;
    color: var(--primary);
    font-size: 1.5rem;
  }
  .card h3 i {
    margin-right: 10px;
    color: var(--accent);
  }
  .btn {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 12px 24px;
    background: var(--accent);
    color: white;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-radius: 50px;
    margin-top: 1rem;
    font-weight: bold;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    border: 2px solid var(--accent);
  }
  .btn:hover {
    background: transparent;
    color: var(--accent);
  }
  .btn-outline {
    background: transparent;
    color: var(--accent);
    border: 2px solid white;
  }
  .testimonials {
    background: var(--light);
    padding: 3rem 2rem;
    margin: 3rem 0;
    border-radius: 20px;
  }
  .quote-icon {
    color: var(--accent);
    font-size: 2rem;
    opacity: 0.3;
  }
  .language-switcher {
    position: absolute;
    top: 20px;
    right: 20px;
  }
  .language-btn {
    background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
    border: none;
    color: white;
    padding: 5px 10px;
    border-radius: 5px;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  .floating-icon {
    position: absolute;
    opacity: 0.1;
    font-size: 5rem;
    z-index: 0;
  }
  .card-content {
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
  }
</style>
